title: Tassel
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: White linen tassel with long braided stem attached to a pear-shaped base. Core is braided over with linen yarns worked in groups of seven for a basket-weave effect. Around the base hang tiny braided balls and from the bottom hang a few clusters of the tiny braided balls.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tassel.
Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-51-65.
